artist: Artist: after Auguste Louis Lepère; Engraver: Eugène Dété
description: river view; boats clustered together at left; man fishing, LRC; bridge with arches in middle ground at center; buildings, URQ

title: Saint-Paul Harbor and the Dock of Célestins
